name: From Home To Hell
description: This is a map pack for Doom 2, which contains 7 levels. These maps follow these rules: *No super shotgun *No backpack *An Ultimate Doom Style //*****MISSION***// A big, unstoppable demon summoned a horde of his minions to conquer your planet. However, God has put you, a veteran UAC law enforcer, in his path of destruction. Your mission is clear: travel to his hellish home, obliterate him and return home. //****END OF MISSION***//
